response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, reflecting years of dedication and innovation. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $950,000, a generous discount that reflects our commitment to making such high-quality offerings more accessible to discerning individuals like yourself. Please consider this an opportunity to own a piece of excellence that could significantly enhance your life or business. If you are interested in proceeding with this offer, please let me know, and we can discuss further details.", "product_price": 950000}
